briefTitle: Palliative Hypofractionated Radiotherapy in Advanced Incurable Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Hypofractionated Radiotherapy Schedule of 35 Gray in 10 Fractions in Advanced Incurable Breast Cancer: A Prospective Phase I/II Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Proportion of patients with CTCAE 4.03 defined Grade 3 or more toxicity
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria: (all of 1-4)

1.Invasive carcinoma of the breast 2.ECOG performance Status:0,I,II 3a.Locally Advanced breast cancer which is not amenable to curative surgery as decided by Multidisciplinary tumor board OR 3b.Metastatic breast cancer patients: i) who are awaiting palliative locoregional radiotherapy for symptom (pain,bleeding,ulceration) ii) who have completed a scheduled course of palliative chemotherapy and is felt to benefit from local radiation therapy 4.Able to give consent

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Breast reconstruction using implants
2. Concurrent cyto-toxic chemotherapy -
